description: createrss command overwrites existing RSS feeds without verifying permissions
pivot command allows a search to bypass SPL safeguards for risky commands using a saved job
search_listener parameter in a Search allows for a Blind Server Side Request Forgery by an authenticated user

display.page.search.patterns.sensitivity search parameter allows a search to bypass SPL safeguards for risky commands using obfuscation

runshellscript searches should not be run interactively via User Interface or REST API and may be used to bypass safeguards;
runshellscript may be abused to exploit legacy internal functions in external lookups leading to arbitrary code execution

The “mrollup” SPL command lets a low-privileged user view metrics on an index that they do not have permission to view. This vulnerability requires user interaction from a high-privileged user to exploit.
The "mstats" SPL command lets malicious user can control a search query in Analytics Workspace using params from another search (via job SID) and quotation mark ' ' and " incorrect handling
